definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Covert weapons development, in contrast, is rife with problems.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，秘密武器的发展流弊颇多。

sentences.english: Norm along the Confucian theory of learning to the end of Han, has many shortcomings.
sentences.chinese: 儒家名教理论沿习至汉末，已流弊丛生。

sentences.english: But it is my opinion that things must be done in such a way that there will be minimum disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 但我认为，应把这种计划的流弊减少到最低限度。

definition: (archaic) light, bright (variant of 冏[jiong3])/(since c. 2005) (slang) emoticon signifying embarrassment, shock, helplessness etc
variant of 裝屄|装屄[zhuang1 bi1]
penis/(slang) cool or extraordinary/(Cantonese) to fuck
to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
(Internet slang) I can't even.../Are you kidding me!/OMG!
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
